subject: JCoverage Implementation Problem
msgSnippet: Hi, I am facing a strange problem while implementing JCoverage for one of the projects. I have done this successfully in the past for other projects. Any help
messageBody:
Hi,
I am facing a strange problem while implementing JCoverage for one of
the projects. I have done this successfully in the past for other
projects. Any help will be appreciated.

Here are the error logs:

jcoverage 1.0.5 copyright (c)2003 jcoverage ltd. http://jcoverage.com/
jcoverage is licensed under the GNU General Public License
jcoverage comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY
instrumenting 286 classes
[instrument] Exception in thread "main"
java.lang.NoSuchMethodError
[instrument] at
org.apache.bcel.classfile.LineNumberTable.toString
(LineNumberTable.java:169)
[instrument] at org.apache.bcel.classfile.Code.toString
(Code.java:342)
[instrument] at com.jcoverage.util.JavaClassHelper.dump
(JavaClassHelper.java:64)
[instrument] at
com.jcoverage.coverage.Instrument.instrument(Instrument.java:140)
[instrument] at
com.jcoverage.coverage.Instrument.addInstrumentation
(Instrument.java:194)
[instrument] at
com.jcoverage.coverage.Instrument.addInstrumentation
(Instrument.java:206)
[instrument] at
com.jcoverage.coverage.Instrument.addInstrumentation
(Instrument.java:223)
[instrument] at com.jcoverage.coverage.Instrument.main
(Instrument.java:229)

BUILD FAILED

------------------------------------------
I guess this is not a implementation problem as the same thing is
working fine at other places.

Regards,
Yogi
